E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/14/1989
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Gary Roenicke



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1989
Subject: Progress of Mark Wohlers
Dear Sir,
Mark Wohlers has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1989
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Mike LaCoss



Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1989
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Mike Jeffcoat



Date: Wednesday, 6/25/1989
Subject: Progress of Rod Beck
Dear Sir,
Rod Beck has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an ERA of 3.86 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Tuesday, 7/1/1989
Subject: Extension?

How about you?

Regards,
Bo Diaz
